summary: An ordinance relating to the improvement of 40th Ave. Southwest from Southwest 98th St. to Southwest 102nd St., and certain other streets, avenues, easements and alleys, by constructing a sanitary sewer system and otherwise improving the same; as authorized by Ordinance No. 92853, creating Local Improvement District No. 6299; increasing the Sewer Fund to aid said local improvement district and amending Section 2 of said ordinance.
